alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 12:39PM PST until January 24 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog, especially during the overnight hours. * WHERE...Colfax, Rosalia, Clarkston, Pomeroy, Tekoa, La Crosse, Clarkston Heights, Uniontown, Pullman, and Oakesdale. * WHEN...Until 1 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Freezing fog will result in slick roadways and sidewalks. Conditions may change rapidly. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog should generally remain west of Route 195 into this evening, but expand further overnight.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
